snippet: Critics like to rib Leon Botstein for excessively square conducting that can drain some of the flair from the music.
lead_paragraph: Critics like to rib Leon Botstein for excessively square conducting that can drain some of the flair from the music.

headline.main: A Straussian Tale of Thwarted Lust
